articles.title: Valencia MotoGP: Danilo Petrucci and Andrea Dovizioso “perplexed” by Ducati's Gigi Dall'Igna - but he masterminded their success | MotoGP | News - Crash
articles.description: Danilo Petrucci admits he was left confused by Gigi Dall’Igna’s decisions but, as Ducati prepare to crown a MotoGP champion, their ex-rider has credited the general manager.
articles.content:
Francesco Bagnaia is 23 points ahead of Fabio Quartararo in the MotoGP standings heading into the season finale Valencia MotoGP.
"It's all thanks to Gigi Dall'Igna, ex-Ducati rider Petrucci told La … [+1926 chars]
